Installation
============


.. code-block:: shell

    uv tool install fujin-cli

.. note::

    Checkout the `uv docs <https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/>`_ on how to install it.
    for linux and macos users, run this

    .. code-block:: bash

        curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
